protein_target_name: TGF-β type I receptor ALK5 kinase
raw_mentions:
Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:

A83-01 available from Tocris Bioscience; a selective inhibitor of TGF-β type I receptor ALK5 kinase, type I activin/nodal receptor ALK4 and type I nodal receptor ALK7 (IC50 values can, e.g., be 12, 45 and 7.5 nM respectively).
